document.full_text: google inc will begin allowing users to personally endorse search results and web pages, its latest attempt to stave off rival facebook inc while trying to jump onboard a social networking boom.
document.title: google takes on facebook with latest social tweak
lines_and_colors: google inc will begin allowing users to personally endorse search results and web pages, its latest attempt to stave off rival facebook inc while trying to jump onboard a social networking boom.
